text: Sverige, det bästa på vår jord is a song written by Sebastian Fronda, Mikael Clauss and Thomas Thörnholm. The song won an Aftonbladet early 2008 Internet contest, applying for the Team Sweden fight song for the 2008 UEFA European Football Championship in Austria and Switzerland. The song was recorded by Markoolio and was released as a single on 5 May 2008. It also appeared on his 2008 studio album, called Jag är konst. The song peaked at number one on the Swedish Singles Chart. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !Chart (2008) !Peak position |- | Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|1 |} == References == Category:2008 singles Category:Fight songs Category:Markoolio songs Category:Number-one singles in Sweden Category:Sweden national football team Category:Swedish-language songs Category:Sweden at UEFA Euro 2008 Category:2008 songs Category:Songs written by Thomas Thörnholm Category:2008 in Swedish football
title: Sverige, det bästa på vår jord
